action.action-desc: Mr. Turner introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To prohibit covered entities from requiring consumers to solely use digital monthly statements, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting Against Paperless and Electronic Requirements Act or the PAPER Act.

subsection.text: Each covered entity shall offer each consumer of such entity the option of receiving paper copies of their monthly statements.
A covered entity may not condition the use of any services offered by such entity on the sole use of digital monthly statements by a consumer.

paragraph.text: The term depository institution has the meaning given the term in section 3 of the Federal Deposit Act.
The term credit union has the meaning given the term in section 101 of the Federal Credit Union Act.
The term covered entity means a depository institution or a credit union.
